name: places/ChIJs3qEK6VYwokRbB4_M74gvnw
adrFormatAddress: 1733 2nd Ave, New York, NY 10128-3515, USA

originalText.text: Great if you want to pay a ton of money for your clothes to still be damp after 40 minutes in the dryer.

text.text: Great if you want to pay a ton of money for your clothes to still be damp after 40 minutes in the dryer.

originalText.text: Coming here for two years, i see how they are cleaned each night. No problems whatsoever; and yes i check machines for the smell and no leftovers before i use them, and checking that the cart is in good shape. Usually they are. Never any incidents to observe (i read about fires in the dryer); almost all machines all the time works; coming in the night or during the workday is not busy. I always dry on the lowest heat (takes 20-40 mins) and wash on warm; i am happy with the quality and no damaged cloth.

originalText.text:
Although I think definitely this place is not the cheapest and cleanest place to wash your cloth, it is amongst one of good places I would go to again.
There are many washing machines, small to extra large, as well as dryers.
I have never dropped off my laundry with them though. I have done mine by myself.

text.text:
Although I think definitely this place is not the cheapest and cleanest place to wash your cloth, it is amongst one of good places I would go to again.
There are many washing machines, small to extra large, as well as dryers.
I have never dropped off my laundry with them though. I have done mine by myself.

originalText.text:
The washers are good.  Dryers are not hot enough so you have to run it for longer minutes (and each cycle is expensive).

My problem is the attendant working here.  One of the washer broke mid wash with huge soap foam.  I informed the attendant.  She didn't really speak in coherent sentences, nor took any action to help.  She grudgingly stopped the machine to help me take out my soapy laundry but just walked away without running a new machine cycle. She shrugged and just walked away!!! I had to pay for a new cycle.

I am not fighting for my $4 wash.  I am pissed at her attitude who works there and hates her job.

originalText.text: Between mixing my underwear with someone else’s and refusing to reimburse me, to damaging my clothes, or not being available when you’re trying to pick up, this place is as bad as they come. With all the options in the area there’s no reason to go here.
